skills.name: Identify the number of degrees in fractions of a turn

explanations.A: I think you might be confusing this with 75%. In a full turn you have 360 degrees, so what is three quarters of that?
explanations.B: This is one quarter of a turn, so what are three of these?
explanations.C: This is half a turn. Can you use this to find three quarters?
explanations.D: There are 360° in one whole turn. Therefore, in ¾ of a turn there will be ¾ ✕ 360 = 270°.
